zh.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
zh.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
zh.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
zh.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
zh.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
zh.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
zh.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
zh.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
zh.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
zh.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
zh.country_code_message: 将国家/地区代码设置为此设备的位置。这用于天气预报
zh.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
zh.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
zh.end_port_invalid: 結束端口是無效，它必須在1~65535之間
zh.end_port_message: 此端口的範圍結束數值
zh.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
zh.home_pin_message: 此PIN是使用於Homebridge加入Apple家庭應用程式。
zh.home_username: 家庭應用程式的使用者名稱
zh.home_username_message: 使用者名稱 Apple家庭應用程式使用於確認的Homebridge
zh.homebridge_username_required: 要求家庭應用程式的使用者名稱
zh.homekit_disconnect: 这将使Homebridge与Apple Home断开连接。你需要重新配对。
zh.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
zh.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
zh.invalid_port_range: 無效輸入範圍的結束，它必須正確開端。
zh.language_message: 設定介的語言或是設定它自動使用您的語言。
zh.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
zh.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
zh.name: 名稱
zh.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
zh.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
zh.postal_code_message: 将邮政编码设置为此设备的位置。这用于天气预报
zh.range_name_message: 埠範圍就是描述將被確認埠的範圍。
zh.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
zh.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
zh.service_description_message: 在這系統上Homebridge要使用名字來協助您確認的
zh.service_name_message: 在這系統上使用Homebridge服務要確認的
zh.service_port_invalid: 服務輸出埠是無效，它必須的數值在1~65535。
zh.start_port_invalid: 開始輸出埠是無效，它必須在1到65535之間
zh.temp_units_message: 设置要显示温度传感器的单位。
zh.time_format_message: This only affects times in the interface.
